mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vol_review (member_id, apply_id, reviewer_nm, title, content, rating, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{applicationId}, #{userName}, #{title}, #{content}, #{rating}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT vr.review_id, vr.member_id AS user_id, COALESCE(m.name, vr.reviewer_nm) AS user_name, vr.apply_id AS application_id, va.sel_cat AS activity_name, va.vol_exp AS volunteer_experience, vr.title, vr.content, vr.rating, vr.created_at FROM vol_review vr LEFT JOIN member m ON vr.member_id = m.member_id LEFT JOIN vol_apply va ON vr.apply_id = va.apply_id WHERE vr.review_id = #{reviewId}

SELECT vr.review_id, vr.member_id AS user_id, COALESCE(m.name, vr.reviewer_nm) AS user_name, vr.apply_id AS application_id, va.sel_cat AS activity_name, va.vol_exp AS volunteer_experience, vr.title, vr.content, vr.rating, vr.created_at FROM vol_review vr LEFT JOIN member m ON vr.member_id = m.member_id LEFT JOIN vol_apply va ON vr.apply_id = va.apply_id ORDER BY vr.created_at DESC
